rogue_1.name: Phantom & Crimson Solitaire
rogue_1.lineText:
Beneath the darkening sky, you find yourself lost in a fog-shrouded forest.
You are in desperate need of safe shelter to pass the night,
and it appears that the ominous castle ahead is your only choice.

grandPrizes.displayDiscription:
Shalem had locked himself away, seeking to escape the phantoms of the past.
Now, he seeks to rescue Phantom alongside you.
He has mustered up the courage to face his past and future.
He is no longer alone.

You have seen this emblem many times.
You will see it again.
However...
Will you let it become a symbol of yourself?

Phantom's past and present intertwine here.
It is both familiar yet strange.
If he trusts you, then you must take this responsibility upon yourself.
Determine his future.

The operators gather their data, and their data transform into results.
The 'Attendant of Artistry,' a place isolated from all creation.
The 'Invitation to Repose,' a place even the common folk can enjoy.
The 'Decaying Husk,' a place hidden within the woods.

You need a disguise to disguise yourself.
When the actors step onto the stage, their costumes are indispensable.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely audience members.
Now sing, Phantom.

The operators gather their data, and their data transform into results.
One such result is the 'Dull Remnants' you see before you.
An old castle is bound to have decorations that even its master have forgotten.
Perhaps they will get a new life under the possession of an outsider?

A gift from the elite specialist operators.
This can help them better understand themselves and improve their inner potential.
Are you perhaps thinking in your head how best to use them right now?
Will you store them away until a more opportune time?

The artifact that once belonged to Gaul yet turns.
Time itself is winding the clock.
History itself is fine tuning its time.
Listen carefully, for the performance will soon begin.

The mission it was entrusted by history itself has been completed.
The troupe will retrieve it from the seas of the forgotten.
Time and again, it will become a stage.
History will not remember, but art will make it eternal.

monthMission.desc: Obtain a total of 35 collectibles
Recruit a total of 35 Operators
Defeat a total of 500 enemies
Clear a total of 50 nodes
Play a total of 10 rounds
Promote Operators a total of 10 times
Use Originium Ingots a total of 100 times
Raise your Command Level a total of 15 times
Clear a total of 15 floors
Purchase a total of 10 items from the Rogue Trader
Consume Hope a total of 75 times during Recruitment
Temporarily recruit a total of 10 Operators
Clear a total of 24 Encounter nodes
Clear a total of 8 Emergency Ops. nodes
Obtain a total of 4 Tactical Prop
Recruit a total of 8 Operators in Support Recruitment
Perfectly clear a total of 12 Combat Operations.
Clear a total of 8 Downtime Recreation
Clear an entire floor while hallucinating
Defeat a total of 4 Bosses
Recruit a total of 12 Specialist or Supporter Operators
Defeat the Duck Lord 3 times
Clear a total of 1 ending
Invest a total of 30 Originium Ingots with the Prospective Investment System
Obtain a total of 6 Hot Water Kettles
Protected a total of 12 Unowned Treasures

month_team_1.teamDes: The Sarkaz include many diverse cultures and intricate inter-racial relationships. However, to Mudrock, Warfarin, and Vigna, what brings them together is their friendship and their passion for life.

month_team_2.teamDes: Those who seem to be the older in years are not necessarily older. Those who seem to be younger... They might indeed be younger. When flowers bloom from an old tree branch, is it the old getting a new breath of life, or is it instead new lives opening their lives to the world's embrace?

month_team_3.teamDes: If the Yanese are proud of their cuisine, the Siracusans are definitely no less confident in theirs. As the country that places the most emphasis on their cuisine, the Siracusans can be quite particular when it comes to preparing their meals.

month_team_4.teamDes: Kay loves Dur-nar and Sesa, because Dur-nar always carries a bunch of tasty treats, and Sesa always has so many amazing stories to tell. Sesa loves Kay, and the wilderness as well, because Kay is the only person on Rhodes Island who will listen to all his stories, and the wilderness reminds him of home. Dur-nar needs to follow the two of them closely, just in case they decide to leave Rhodes Island together to explore the wilderness.

month_team_5.teamDes: Emergency up ahead! Don't think about it, just run! After the green one came a bundle of gray. Hold on, that girl in the back looks kinda different! Just as much bravado, though!

month_team_6.teamDes: A city withers in the span of a winter. The survivors make it out into the snowfields, firmly believing that they will save even more lives next time.

month_team_7.teamDes: 1/24th of a Victorian's day is devoted to a certain activity. A cup of tea brings people together, sharing their secrets with each other.

month_team_8.teamDes: Behind the gold brooch is the story of the fall of a royal house. Behind every person are the people and things they care about.

rogue_1_challenge_01.challengeDes: Considering the extremely urgent nature of this field operation, after much deliberation, the commander has been authorized to dispatch four elite operators. Please resolve the incident as quickly as possible, and bring Operator Phantom back in one piece.
challengeConditionDes: Unable to perform Initial Recruitment, but instead start with 4 Elite Operators
The probability of encountering an Emergency Operation is greatly increased
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_02.challengeDes: Who's really the one with their back to the wall?
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: King's New Lance, 'End of Times'
Start exploration with the Spearhead Squad
Harder to gain Life Points during exploration
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_03.challengeDes: Earning money is an art, as is spending it.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Proof of Friendship, Supreme Ring.
Start exploration with the Support Squad
A special zone layout will be used, and the probability of encountering the Rogue Trader or a combat node is greatly increased
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_04.challengeDes: Who needs a front line when you have enough firepower to blast through all obstacles?
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Necklace of the Presence, Royal Liqueur, Dreaming Essence, Manifestation Pendant, 'Shadow.'
Begin with 2 Sniper and 2 Caster Operators
During exploration, the appearance rate of Sniper and Caster-related Recruitment Vouchers and collectibles is greatly increased
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_05.challengeDes: Who needs backup when your squad is strong enough to shred right through the enemy's line of defense?
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Emperor's Favor, Ribbon of Honor, 'Loyalty', 'Shadow'
Begin with 2 Guard and 2 Defender Operators
During exploration, the appearance rate of Guard and Defender-related Recruitment Vouchers and collectibles is greatly increased
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_06.challengeDes: The road in front of us isn't the only thing obscured from sight, but that is no reason to stop pushing on.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: 'Bladedance', 'Whiteflower', 'Shadow', and a random negative collectible
'Blind' hallucinations will regularly trigger during exploration
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_07.challengeDes: When words become your sword and shield, will you still be able to successfully bring Phantom back to Rhodes Island?
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Lucky Coin, Masquerade Mask, 'Magnificent Visage'
A special zone layout will be used, and the probability of encountering a non-combat node is greatly increased
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_08.challengeDes: When a mission is on the verge of failure, anything can be exchanged as a resource to tip the scales. Even the command terminal is no exception.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: 'End of Times', 'Eventide Terror', 'Excessiveness'
Start exploration with the Leader Squad, unable to perform Initial Recruitment
Easier to gain Life Points during exploration
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.
rogue_1_challenge_08.taskDes: Allow 30 enemies to enter the Objective Point

rogue_1_challenge_09.challengeDes: Being lost isn't necessarily a bad thing. This time, you will explore more possibilities.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: 'Four-Leaf Clover Fossil,' Crimson Troupe Ticket Stub
The probability of encountering a combat node is increased
'Bewildered' hallucinations will regularly trigger during exploration
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.

rogue_1_challenge_10.challengeDes: Saving up is a good habit. It can satisfy your heart's desire to hoard, while also delivering an acute headache to your enemies.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Golden Chalice, Supreme Ring, Masquerade Mask
The probability of the Rogue Trader appearing is greatly reduced
The probability of obtaining collectibles that directly provide Originium Ingots is greatly reduced
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.
rogue_1_challenge_10.taskDes: Gain 100 Originium Ingots (not including starting amount)

rogue_1_challenge_11.challengeDes: What kind of treasure will we get our hands on today? I'm really looking forward to it.
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Victorian 'Scrap' Medal, Leithanian Medal of Honor
A special zone layout will be used, and the probability of encountering a Dreadful Foe or a Boon is greatly increased
The Rogue Trader will sell more Recruitment Vouchers
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.
rogue_1_challenge_11.taskDes: Encounter the Dreadful Foe node 3 times

rogue_1_challenge_12.challengeDes: Have a chat with Lady Luck before setting out on your mission. Does she want to be your companion today, or your enemy?
challengeConditionDes: Begin with the following collectibles: Proof of Longevity, Banshee's Kiss, Flawless Jadestone
A special zone layout will be used, and the probability of encountering an Downtime Recreation node is greatly increased
Random hallucinations will regularly trigger during exploration
The castle's overall layout differs from usual. Please proceed with caution.
rogue_1_challenge_12.taskDes: Enter the Downtime Recreation node 6 times

difficulties.name: Castle Sightseeing
difficulties.ruleDesc: 'Silent Squad' will escort you the whole way
difficulties.failForceDesc: Promoting or raising your operators' levels and skills can grant you a greater advantage during combat

difficulties.name: Formal Investigation
difficulties.ruleDesc: Hopefully this will turn out to be an uneventful investigation
difficulties.failForceDesc: Promoting or raising your operators' levels and skills can grant you a greater advantage during combat

difficulties.failForceDesc: Promoting or raising your operators' levels and skills can grant you a greater advantage during combat

difficulties.name: Monthly Squad
difficulties.ruleDesc: Squads are refreshed on the first day of each month
difficulties.failForceDesc: Understanding your Monthly Squad members' characteristics and putting them to good use
difficulties.unlockText: Unlocked after a single [Regular Operations] exploration

difficulties.name: Deep Investigation
difficulties.ruleDesc: A challenge mode that provides a unique experience.
difficulties.failForceDesc: Make full use of the special conditions provided by your [Investigation Item] to gain an edge in combat
difficulties.unlockText: Unlocked after reaching an ending in [Regular Operations]

ro1_n_1_1.name: A Date With Slugs
ro1_n_1_1.description: In a play where the ending is yet to be decided, man does not necessarily have more of a presence than Originium Slugs.

ro1_n_1_2.name: Beast Taming
ro1_n_1_2.description:
The moment the two beast tamers blow their whistles, the hounds all scramble out of their enclosure to feast. 
<@rolv.rem><Originium Altar> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units. </>

ro1_n_1_3.name: Gun Salute
ro1_n_1_3.description: When there are visitors, we have to welcome them with a gun salute. With the fog covering the entire area, though, we might have a little trouble with the firing trajectory.

ro1_n_1_4.name: Accident
ro1_n_1_4.description: The actors are practicing how to avoid landing on traps as they parachute down, yet your arrival has kicked their training intensity up a notch.

ro1_n_1_5.name: Fight to the Death
ro1_n_1_5.description:
A dance in fire; a competition for the dancer's attention. 
<@rolv.rem>There are <Heat Pump Passages> that will periodically deal damage to units above them.</>

ro1_n_2_1.name: The Grand Finale
ro1_n_2_1.description: Don't just worry about dealing with the mercenaries and Originium slugs. The most troublesome folks always show up last.

ro1_n_2_2.name: Patrol Squad
ro1_n_2_2.description: A team of mercenaries are patrolling in the courtyard. Their hounds pick up the scent of strangers and start barking immediately, sending the entire squad your way.

ro1_n_2_3.name: Destitute Knights
ro1_n_2_3.description: A ground of expelled Kazimierzian knights have become wandering mercenaries, their former titles revealed by the insignias on their clothing.

ro1_n_2_4.name: Unequal Split
ro1_n_2_4.description: The bandits and casters are having an argument over the unowned treasure. Just as they are about to come to blows, your entrance gives them a different idea.

ro1_n_2_5.name: First Come, Last Served
ro1_n_2_5.description: You encounter a band of mercenaries who have also lost their way. Short on food, they set their sights on your bag.

ro1_n_3_1.name: Justice
ro1_n_3_1.description:
An Ursus tragedy is unfolding yet again here in the castle. The choice you make is no different from that of the countless of men who came before you.
<@rolv.rem>DP recovery rate is decreased, and tiles do not have melee/ranged restrictions</>

ro1_n_3_2.name: A Familiar Face
ro1_n_3_2.description:
A Sarkaz woman and her underling... Though you do not remember the details, you are certain you have gone through this before.
<@rolv.rem><Medical Rune> Operators deployed on this tile will restore HP over time.</>

ro1_n_3_3.name: Vintage Transport
ro1_n_3_3.description: You see a pile of goods scattered across the ground and a swarm of Originium slugs rampaging about. The flustered transport team's manager is trying to catch all the escaping slugs. Perhaps you can help him.

ro1_n_3_4.name: With The Crowd
ro1_n_3_4.description: There's no telling who it was that yelled, but a bustling crowd starts to swarm toward you.

ro1_n_3_5.name: Beast Fighting
ro1_n_3_5.description:
This place is originally meant for watching hounds fight each other, but now...
<@rolv.rem>Operators will lose a certain percentage of HP when they are initially deployed</>

ro1_n_3_6.name: Premiere
ro1_n_3_6.description: This is the first time some members of the audience are watching a performance of the troupe. The dancers' alluring postures have made many of them impetuous and easily angered. They will not tolerate even a single word of criticism against the dancers.

ro1_n_3_7.name: Reform
ro1_n_3_7.description: The troupe accepted these prisoners and promised them freedom. What these convicts don't know is that even though their bodies will be freed from this moment, their souls will forever be imprisoned.

ro1_n_3_8.name: Sculptor and Statue
ro1_n_3_8.description:
The sculptor needs his livelihood. The statue needs maintenance. Who will provide the resources? Only the passing traveler. 
<@rolv.rem>There are <Tattered Pillars> that can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes; No melee/ranged deployment restrictions</>

ro1_n_4_1.name: Pressing Ahead
ro1_n_4_1.description:
The enemies of the past all emerge from the shadows one by one, yet their equipment seems multitudes better than before.
<@rolv.rem>DP recovery rate is decreased, and tiles do not have melee/ranged restrictions</>

ro1_n_4_2.name: Shrouded in Clouds
ro1_n_4_2.description:
With how difficult it is to breathe here because of all the smog, you want to get away as soon as possible. The enemies lurking in the dark have a different idea, though.
<@rolv.rem><Poison Haze> Operators lose HP constantly.</>

ro1_n_4_3.name: Fireworks Show
ro1_n_4_3.description: The actors setting the stage are ready to go. All there is left to do is to have the audience members come forward and 'place' the fireworks on their heads.

ro1_n_4_4.name: Unending
ro1_n_4_4.description:
A group of Sarkaz men are having nightmares. Driven by their fear, they scramble ever forward,
<@rolv.rem><Stun Generator> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies. </>

ro1_n_4_5.name: Traveler From Afar
ro1_n_4_5.description: These men are here in search of allies who will help the Taran cause, no matter if the 'artists' here are good or evil.

ro1_n_4_6.name: A Dance Together
ro1_n_4_6.description: The dancers and audience members are dancing together, and there are balloons sending presents to everyone all around the ballroom. The night is young, and the excitement has just begun.

ro1_n_4_7.name: Bob's Beers
ro1_n_4_7.description: You see a group of ruffians sorting out the supplies they made off witha large amount of Originium slug beer and drones transporting infused Originium slug extract. Perhaps you can help the brewers get their supplies back. They'll be very happy about it.

ro1_n_4_8.name: Alpine Visitor
ro1_n_4_8.description:
Not everyone who has seen the world outside is willing to return to the land of ice and snow. Some have chosen to abandon Karlan for a new life. 
<@rolv.rem>There are <Originium Ice Crystals> that periodically inflict [Cold] to nearby units.</>

ro1_n_5_1.name: Drone Landing Zone
ro1_n_5_1.description: The Troupe isn't a conservative, ancient organization. In addition to their pursuit in their classical interests, they also take pleasure in employing modern technologies, such as the swarm of drones above your head.

ro1_n_5_2.name: The Red Mist
ro1_n_5_2.description:
It is now midnight, and the ominous red mist is still spreading throughout the area. The mist is seeking out souls that still have sanity left in order to drag them into the deep abyss.
<@rolv.rem><Poison Haze> Operators lose HP constantly.</>

ro1_n_5_3.name: The Night of Ritual
ro1_n_5_3.description: The mysterious ceremony has given these Sarkaz soldiers unprecedented strength by harnessing the red moon's power. At the very last moment of the ceremony, you knock over a candle on the altar.

ro1_n_5_4.name: The Biting Cold
ro1_n_5_4.description:
The ice-blue altar twinkles bright, inviting all astray travelers to lie down for a brief respite. As soon as the resting souls are completely frozen, the thugs hiding in the dark will emerge to shatter them into pieces.
<@rolv.rem><Originium Ice Crystal> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold on affected allied units</>

ro1_n_5_5.name: Dangers Abound
ro1_n_5_5.description:
Spirits are abound, and the mechanisms here continue their endless rumble. Resistance is futile, for there is nowhere to run underneath the red moon.
<@rolv.rem><Turrets> Periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical Damage to our units.</>

ro1_n_5_6.name: Surprise Factory
ro1_n_5_6.description: Some lucky audience members who got their heads smacked by the 'Small Surprises' have 'voluntarily' come to participate in the making of these airdrop gifts. They don't have the mental capacity to think much more, as all they want to do now is make more 'Small Surprises' and share the 'joy' with everyone.

ro1_n_5_7.name: Absurd Trickeries
ro1_n_5_7.description:
The fearless knights charge forward, firing the enthusiasm of the audience. The unclaimed riches twinkle under the spotlight, luring those blinded by the sight into the abyss.
<@rolv.rem><Corrosive Ground> Operators deployed on it have decreased DEF</>

ro1_n_5_8.name: From Afar
ro1_n_5_8.description:
There will always be people who like to watch quietly from afar as tragedy unfolds. 
<@rolv.rem>There is <Active Originium> that greatly increases ATK and ASPD, at the cost of gradual HP loss.</>

ro1_n_6_1.name: Sarkaz Desire
ro1_n_6_1.description:
This ragtag team is the embodiment of the SarkazOrderless, fearless, and ruthless.
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>

ro1_n_6_2.name: Ursus Desire
ro1_n_6_2.description: This ragtag team is the embodiment of UrsusLarge, strong, and imposing. They desire conquest.

ro1_b_1.name: Mind the Doors
ro1_b_1.description: The spire caster's abandoned trinkets were modified, eventually becoming the castle's indefatigable guardian. At the same time, it has also proven to be the some of the new actors' barrier to entry.

ro1_b_2.name: Theft from Above
ro1_b_2.description:
A flying bandit just made off with the Troupe's treasured prize, and you just so happen to be in his path of escape.
<@rolv.rem><Anti-Air Rune> Operators deployed on this tile have slightly reduced ASPD but greatly increased ATK when attacking Aerial units</>

ro1_b_3.name: Terrifying Legends
ro1_b_3.description:
You see a violent, completely mutated Infected. He howls and attacks you, reminding you of a particular, and terrifying, Rim Billiton legend.
<@rolv.rem>His ATK and ASPD increase as he continuously attacks</>

ro1_b_4.name: Fatal Melodies
ro1_b_4.description:
The puppet plays his instrument unceasingly, filling the hall with a gentle melody. Yet, when you listen carefully, you notice that, behind the melody, there is an ear-piercing noise that attempts to seize the will of a listener.
<@rolv.rem>When not blocked, continuously deals Arts damage to all allied units</>

ro1_b_5.name: A Cold Separation
ro1_b_5.description:
A tragic tale is being performed on the stage right this momenta Snowpriest and her bodyguard are separated from each other. They want to share the information they have with each other, but things are bound to never go their way.
<@rolv.rem>When either of the two is incapacitated, the other will inherit all abilities of the fallen and see their combat abilities increased significantly</>

ro1_b_6.name: The Point of No Return
ro1_b_6.description:
Rescue him. 
<@rolv.rem><Roadblocks> Block the enemys route</>

ro1_b_7.name: All I Ask of You
ro1_b_7.description: The kindhearted souls are being coerced to do wrong by the fanatics. The very sight brings you to tears, and it's time to put things right.

ro1_b_8.name: Twisted Every Way
ro1_b_8.description:
You have completely ruined the host's grand performance, and he wants nothing more than to end you right here and now. With all that you have been through on this journey, you feel the same toward him.
<@rolv.rem>Natural DP regeneration is greatly reduced; <'Host's Assistant> Nearby allies have reduced ATK and continuously receive True damage. </>

ro1_b_9.name: New Chapter
ro1_b_9.description: Throw the abandoned draft into the fire. Take out a new sheet of paper, and begin anew.

ro1_t_1.name: Duck Lord's Play
ro1_t_1.description:
The famous Columbian merchant Duck Lord runs amok on the stage, scattering Originium Ingots everywhere. Let's get him out of here!
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>

ro1_t_2.name: Duck Lord's Party
ro1_t_2.description:
Famous Columbian merchant Duck Lord seems to have some information about the castle. Don't let him get away!
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>

ro1_t_3.name: Gopnik's Fist
ro1_t_3.description:
The only thing is, the famous Ursus businessman, has challenged you, and the rewards are sure to be rich. 
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>

ro1_t_4.name: This Ursus Man
ro1_t_4.description:
There are those who try to forget their pasts and live a dignified life, then there are those who cannot escape the cluelessness and pain they have been through, like this Ursus man.
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>

ro1_ev_1.name: 'Knights' Duel'
ro1_ev_1.description: 'I heard there are basically two types of knights these days. Those that spell profit and those that don't. Which type are these four, do you think?'

ro1_ev_2.name: Demonic Cage
ro1_ev_2.description: The terrifying pureblood Vampire disappears into the shadows of the castle with a maniacal laugh, leaving behind her twisted, shadowy servant.

ro1_ev_3.name: Disorderly Banquet
ro1_ev_3.description: Art is merely a convenient excuse. What they truly want to do is to strip away what little humanity there is left in them with spices and alcohol.

ro1_ev_4.name: Bound by Self
ro1_ev_4.description: Alas, the pen touches page, but all that is produced is hogwash.

ro1_ev_5.name: Observation
ro1_ev_5.description: 'I want to know your motivation. What would you do under these circumstances?'

ro1_e_1_1.name: A Date With Slugs
ro1_e_1_1.description: In a play where the ending is yet to be decided, man does not necessarily have more of a presence than Originium Slugs.
ro1_e_1_1.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

The moment the two beast tamers blow their whistles, the hounds all scramble out of their enclosure to feast. 
<@rolv.rem><Originium Altar> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units. </>
ro1_e_1_2.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_1_3.description: When there are visitors, we have to welcome them with a gun salute. With the fog covering the entire area, though, we might have a little trouble with the firing trajectory.
ro1_e_1_3.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have greatly increased ATK and HP.

<@rolv.rem>There are <Heat Pump Passages> that will periodically deal damage to units above them.</>
ro1_e_1_5.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_2_1.name: The Grand Finale
ro1_e_2_1.description: Don't just worry about dealing with the mercenaries and Originium slugs. The most troublesome folks always show up last.
ro1_e_2_1.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased HP.

ro1_e_2_2.name: Patrol Squad
ro1_e_2_2.description: A team of mercenaries are patrolling in the courtyard. Their hounds pick up the scent of strangers and start barking immediately, sending the entire squad your way.
ro1_e_2_2.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased ATK.

ro1_e_2_3.name: Destitute Knights
ro1_e_2_3.description: A ground of expelled Kazimierzian knights have become wandering mercenaries, their former titles revealed by the insignias on their clothing.
ro1_e_2_3.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally are invisible.

ro1_e_2_4.name: Unequal Split
ro1_e_2_4.description: The bandits and casters are having an argument over the unowned treasure. Just as they are about to come to blows, your entrance gives them a different idea.
ro1_e_2_4.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_2_5.name: First Come, Last Served
ro1_e_2_5.description: You encounter a band of mercenaries who have also lost their way. Short on food, they set their sights on your bag.
ro1_e_2_5.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_3_1.name: Justice
ro1_e_3_1.description:
An Ursus tragedy is unfolding yet again here in the castle. The choice you make is no different from that of the countless of men who came before you.
<@rolv.rem>DP recovery rate is decreased, and tiles do not have melee/ranged restrictions</>
ro1_e_3_1.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_3_2.name: A Familiar Face
ro1_e_3_2.description:
A Sarkaz woman and her underling... Though you do not remember the details, you are certain you have gone through this before.
<@rolv.rem><Medical Rune> Operators deployed on this tile will restore HP over time.</>
ro1_e_3_2.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased DEF and greatly increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_3_3.name: Vintage Transport
ro1_e_3_3.description: You see a pile of goods scattered across the ground and a swarm of Originium slugs rampaging about. The flustered transport team's manager is trying to catch all the escaping slugs. Perhaps you can help him.
ro1_e_3_3.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_3_4.name: With The Crowd
ro1_e_3_4.description: There's no telling who it was that yelled, but a bustling crowd starts to swarm toward you.
ro1_e_3_4.eliteDesc: Condition: All enemies have significantly increased HP.

ro1_e_3_5.name: Beast Fighting
ro1_e_3_5.description:
This place is originally meant for watching hounds fight each other, but now...
<@rolv.rem>Operators will lose a certain percentage of HP when they are initially deployed</>
ro1_e_3_5.eliteDesc: Condition: Friendly Operators lose more HP upon deployment, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_3_6.name: Premiere
ro1_e_3_6.description: This is the first time some members of the audience are watching a performance of the troupe. The dancers' alluring postures have made many of them impetuous and easily angered. They will not tolerate even a single word of criticism against the dancers.
ro1_e_3_6.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased DEF.

ro1_e_3_7.name: Reform
ro1_e_3_7.description: The troupe accepted these prisoners and promised them freedom. What these convicts don't know is that even though their bodies will be freed from this moment, their souls will forever be imprisoned.
ro1_e_3_7.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_3_8.name: Sculptor and Statue
ro1_e_3_8.description:
The sculptor needs his livelihood. The statue needs maintenance. Who will provide the resources? Only the passing traveler. 
<@rolv.rem>There are <Tattered Pillars> that can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes; No melee/ranged deployment restrictions</>
ro1_e_3_8.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_4_1.name: Pressing Ahead
ro1_e_4_1.description:
The enemies of the past all emerge from the shadows one by one, yet their equipment seems multitudes better than before.
<@rolv.rem>DP recovery rate is decreased, and tiles do not have melee/ranged restrictions</>
ro1_e_4_1.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_4_2.name: Shrouded in Clouds
ro1_e_4_2.description:
With how difficult it is to breathe here because of all the smog, you want to get away as soon as possible. The enemies lurking in the dark have a different idea, though.
<@rolv.rem><Poison Haze> Operators lose HP constantly.</>
ro1_e_4_2.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_4_3.name: Fireworks Show
ro1_e_4_3.description: The actors setting the stage are ready to go. All there is left to do is to have the audience members come forward and 'place' the fireworks on their heads.
ro1_e_4_3.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_4_4.name: Unending
ro1_e_4_4.description:
A group of Sarkaz men are having nightmares. Driven by their fear, they scramble ever forward,
<@rolv.rem><Stun Generator> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies. </>
ro1_e_4_4.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased Movement Speed and HP.

ro1_e_4_5.name: Traveler From Afar
ro1_e_4_5.description: These men are here in search of allies who will help the Taran cause, no matter if the 'artists' here are good or evil.
ro1_e_4_5.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_4_6.name: A Dance Together
ro1_e_4_6.description: The dancers and audience members are dancing together, and there are balloons sending presents to everyone all around the ballroom. The night is young, and the excitement has just begun.
ro1_e_4_6.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased DEF.

ro1_e_4_7.name: Bob's Beers
ro1_e_4_7.description: You see a group of ruffians sorting out the supplies they made off witha large amount of Originium slug beer and drones transporting infused Originium slug extract. Perhaps you can help the brewers get their supplies back. They'll be very happy about it.
ro1_e_4_7.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_4_8.name: Alpine Visitor
ro1_e_4_8.description:
Not everyone who has seen the world outside is willing to return to the land of ice and snow. Some have chosen to abandon Karlan for a new life. 
<@rolv.rem>There are <Originium Ice Crystals> that periodically inflict [Cold] to nearby units.</>
ro1_e_4_8.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Changes to devices on the field.

ro1_e_5_1.name: Drone Landing Zone
ro1_e_5_1.description: The Troupe isn't a conservative, ancient organization. In addition to their pursuit in their classical interests, they also take pleasure in employing modern technologies, such as the swarm of drones above your head.
ro1_e_5_1.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_5_2.name: The Red Mist
ro1_e_5_2.description:
It is now midnight, and the ominous red mist is still spreading throughout the area. The mist is seeking out souls that still have sanity left in order to drag them into the deep abyss.
<@rolv.rem><Poison Haze> Operators lose HP constantly.</>
ro1_e_5_2.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_5_3.name: The Night of Ritual
ro1_e_5_3.description: The mysterious ceremony has given these Sarkaz soldiers unprecedented strength by harnessing the red moon's power. At the very last moment of the ceremony, you knock over a candle on the altar.
ro1_e_5_3.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro1_e_5_4.name: The Biting Cold
ro1_e_5_4.description:
The ice-blue altar twinkles bright, inviting all astray travelers to lie down for a brief respite. As soon as the resting souls are completely frozen, the thugs hiding in the dark will emerge to shatter them into pieces.
<@rolv.rem><Originium Ice Crystal> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold on affected allied units</>
ro1_e_5_4.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_5_5.name: Dangers Abound
ro1_e_5_5.description:
Spirits are abound, and the mechanisms here continue their endless rumble. Resistance is futile, for there is nowhere to run underneath the red moon.
<@rolv.rem><Turrets> Periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical Damage to our units.</>
ro1_e_5_5.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro1_e_5_6.name: Surprise Factory
ro1_e_5_6.description: Some lucky audience members who got their heads smacked by the 'Small Surprises' have 'voluntarily' come to participate in the making of these airdrop gifts. They don't have the mental capacity to think much more, as all they want to do now is make more 'Small Surprises' and share the 'joy' with everyone.
ro1_e_5_6.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased HP and greatly increased ATK.

ro1_e_5_7.name: Absurd Trickeries
ro1_e_5_7.description:
The fearless knights charge forward, firing the enthusiasm of the audience. The unclaimed riches twinkle under the spotlight, luring those blinded by the sight into the abyss.
<@rolv.rem><Corrosive Ground> Operators deployed on it have decreased DEF</>
ro1_e_5_7.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and HP. Certain enemies additionally are invisible.

ro1_e_5_8.name: From Afar
ro1_e_5_8.description:
There will always be people who like to watch quietly from afar as tragedy unfolds. 
<@rolv.rem>There is <Active Originium> that greatly increases ATK and ASPD, at the cost of gradual HP loss.</>
ro1_e_5_8.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Cannot deploy to some positions.

ro1_e_6_1.name: Sarkaz Desire
ro1_e_6_1.description:
This ragtag team is the embodiment of the SarkazOrderless, fearless, and ruthless.
<@rolv.rem><Active Originium> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly</>
ro1_e_6_1.eliteDesc: Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased Movement Speed.

ro1_e_6_2.name: Ursus Desire
ro1_e_6_2.description: This ragtag team is the embodiment of UrsusLarge, strong, and imposing. They desire conquest.
ro1_e_6_2.eliteDesc: Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

zone_1.name: Mist-stricken Missteps
zone_1.description:
17:03
There is fog covering the entire area, and our squad has lost our way. Are we pushing forward, or are we merely dissolving ourselves away?
zone_1.endingDescription: The mist has completely overwhelmed you. There is no longer a need to seek a way out, for this has become your home.

zone_2.name: Sunset Courtyard
zone_2.description:
19:24
The courtyard is filled with the sunset's afterglow, yet that is not the color of hope. Come in, come in, esteemed guests who have wandered astray. The castle welcomes you.
zone_2.endingDescription: The castle has numerous trials in store for its visitors, and you are unable to pay the price of failure.

zone_3.name: Homeland Remnants
zone_3.description:
20:36
As the mist spreads into the castle and the vines make their way up the columns, the dark night appears to have retreated elsewhere for the moment. Do remember as you enjoy this moment of respite, however, that darkness is always right around the corner.
zone_3.endingDescription: As you succumb to the dark shadows, you too will become part of the history of this place.

zone_4.name: Nightmare's Prelude
zone_4.description:
21:53
Darkness falls, the candles throughout the deserted castle begin to light up by themselves, and the silent Nightzmora begins to roam the shadows in search for prey who have lost their way.
zone_4.endingDescription: The candle flames flicker ceaselessly, just as you yet remain in this old castle. You surrender to your endless nightmares, never to awaken again.

zone_5.name: Blood-soaked Corridor
zone_5.description:
00:00
Blood moons often signify the beginning of unfortunate tragedies in written accounts, and this omen is now shining down upon us through the windowpanes that line the corridor.
zone_5.endingDescription: What will emerge beneath the blood moon? Panic? Fear? Frantic wailing? So be it. You have experienced it all.

zone_6.name: Hall of Desires
zone_6.description:
--:--
The purest and truest desires, standing above all time, have engulfed this space whole. Here, there is nothing but the endless thirst for aesthetics, fine arts, and perfection.
zone_6.endingDescription: Too bad. You are not entirely unblemished.

rogue_1_active_tool_1.trapDesc: Obtains additional SP for a character or the Command Terminal

rogue_1_active_tool_2.trapDesc: Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding 4 tiles and amplifies the damage they take for a period of time

rogue_1_active_tool_4.trapDesc: Immediately retreats the targeted Operator and significantly reduces their Redeployment Time

rogue_1_active_tool_5.trapDesc: Slows all enemies in the eight adjacent tiles
